titles.title: Empower Parents in College Act of 2019
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow a recipient of an institutional aid grant to use funds under such grant to establish, improve, or expand partnerships with child care providers.
Empower Parents in College Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Empower Parents in College Act of 2019
This bill authorizes universities to use certain grant funds to partner with local child care providers in offering child care services to their student-parent population.
